locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I have been here several times and it's also so nice and clean they keep the restroom and shower area very clean as well and I would definitely say the staff is always friendly and welcoming and it's very time convenient as well if you are ‚Ä¶
Denny's food was good and the waitress was fabulous. The truck stop has 2 washers and 4 dryers and kind of small shower with fantastic hot water.
Area nice and clean shower was refreshing. Mr. Bob my knob üòÉand Jeff has a good attitude and good customer service. Thank you guys. ‚Ä¶

I travel all over the country with work, this was the worst and dirtiest bathrooms and showers I've seen, usually flying j have good showers and bathrooms, I'd be afraid to shower in there, i would come out more dirty, makes you wonder if ‚Ä¶

The place is okay not to friendly here from the employees. Never great you.

Top it off every time I take a shower here the restrooms aren‚Äôt clean. Looks like someone used the toilet before they cleaned it.
Absolutely disgusting showers. Shower #4 was disgusting. Would not shower a wild animal in that shower

The showers are horrible.  I normally bring my own soaps but I normally go to loves in Springville.  I asked for a shower the cashier was polite. I asked her if they supplied soap she said they supply a bar of soap. Well I get into my ‚Ä¶
Want to meet some truckers.  The new generation of them.  Here they are.  Waiting for a shower that's got germaphobomatic action from he'll.  Just sayin.
Shower rooms not electric outlet you  can't uses any  electric  devices  you below  that ü§î ‚Ä¶
Showers are in poor shape,shower head sprayed water all over except on me,and showers about the size of a broom closet

showerReviews.reviewText: Easy on and off access from I-15. Store is well stocked with hot and cold drinks, snacks and food. Bathroom was clean, fuel priced average. They also had a shower room but didnt check it out.

showerReviews.reviewText: Clean truck stop, both parking and inside. Best part is the shower. It is small, but the heater a/c keeps you toasty and water temp/pressure was great as well. Parking setup kinda reminds me of loves. Has parking for doubles as well (in ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Good quality food, clean, well stocked store  and friendly employees! Their "road trip fuel kits" were a nice surprise too and a inexpensive way to feed a traveling family!

Nice place for a pit stop. Even has a Denny‚Äôs. Always a fan of truck stops but this one specifies that showers and laundry are for truckers. What‚Äôs up with that, moneys money. I didn‚Äôt need it but since I‚Äôm on the road a lot I‚Äôve used such ‚Ä¶

This seems like a nice convenient stop for fuel and food. I got here late at night so not much was going on and the convenience store hadn't cleaned up for the day. So it was a little messy. But they seem to have a real good selection and ‚Ä¶

Plain and simple, this location needs work. The service is poor, the overall facility is dated and 60% of the time, it‚Äôs not clean. But they have everything you need for your travels. They have all the services and options for beverages and snacks as any other location.

This flying j has a spacious parking lot and very easy in and out. They have rv fuel lines that easily accessed. The employees were friendly and the restrooms were clean and sanitary. The store was typical of flying j and lots of bling. A little over priced but it is the convenience that you pay for.

Great place, clean, restrooms can get dirty because of ither guests but can be cleaned pretty easily by talking to guests. All the employees I talked with had great personalities.  As a truck driver it gets full at night. But great place to wake up with the morning air.

I have been here several times and it's also so nice and clean they keep the restroom and shower area very clean as well and I would definitely say the staff is always friendly and welcoming and it's very time convenient as well if you are ‚Ä¶

I usually like Flying Js becauseb they are clean. I'd usually stop at any of them for that reason. From now on when I'm heading through to our from Salt Lake I will stop at this one specifically because the service was AMAZING! I don't know ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Very welcoming and friendly staff. Showers were very clean, me and my girlfriend were able to share one and gave us extra towels. Hot water available plus shower was spacious. Highly recommend this place for travelers. Showers were $15. We ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Boise or Yuma because the flying j a mile away doesn't have this stupidity. I drove through saw the signs and kept going. If I can't stop to rest at a "travel center" then it doesn't get my money. Going to fill up, eat and shower at the j.

‚Ä¶ are always clean and friendly cashiers. But.....took a shower here today and 3 days ago and they have no hot water.  3 days ago the lady apologized for it and even offered a refund (we did not accept). Today we were letting them know it ‚Ä¶

I had stop put on fuel and wanted to grab a shower and the guy I talked to in store I let him know my plans. Besides there was trucks parked on both side of me. Got out to take pictures of mountain for my wife and then got back in my rig. N ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ get on and off the freeway and you have your choice of a chicken shop or McDonald's as well as a very good travel store. There is a truck trucker stop for the truckers to use the shower and I noticed that the bathroom was as clean as a pin.
I do not appreciate a spider watching me while I am taking a shower, so i killed it. Sue me. I like my privacy, tyvm. Perhaps, try using some bugsprays or just renovate all the showers. It needs it.
Shower at Love's always clean. They also provides 3 warm towels, small, medium, large. And soap. Huge bathroom got toilet and sink. Love's got the cheapest most luxury shower ever. 5 out of 5
Very Good Love's TruckStop.........Clean and an Excellent Shower!!! ‚Ä¶

Loves truck stops have severely gone down for customer  service. Showers aren't being cleaned properly. I've had hair on the floor, and the shower does not smell like it was cleaned with some sort of cleanser
Tyler is one of those guys that definitely deserve to be recognized for their work. He helped me get a shower, he has a great attitude towards his work. 5 stars!
